member.name: T:MPT.String.eYesNoUnknown
member.summary: Used for 3-type yes/no/unknown values.

member.name: T:MPT.String.eCapitalization
member.summary: Enumeration of how to return the capitalization sense of a string.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertYesNoUnknownEnum(System.String@)
member.summary: Takes the string value of a yes/no/unknown classification and converts it to an enumeration, or converts from an enumeration to a string.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertTrueYesNoUnknownString(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts a boolean to a descritpion of a YesNoUnknown enumeration.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertTrueYesNoUnknownEnum(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts a boolean to a YesNoUnknown enumeration.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertYesNoUnknownStringBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a YesNoUnkonwn enumeration description to the closes representation of a boolean. 'Unknown' = false.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertYesNoUnknownBoolean(MPT.String.eYesNoUnknown)
member.summary: Converts a YesNoUnkonwn enumeration to the closes representation of a boolean. 'Unknown' = false.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertYesTrueBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a yes/no string into a true/false boolean value. If input is not yes/no, function will return false.
member.param: Parameter to convert. Capitalization does not matter.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertYesTrueString(System.Boolean,MPT.String.eCapitalization)
member.summary: Converts a true/false boolean into a yes/no string.
member.param: Capitalization effect desired for returned string.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.CapitalizationSingleWord(System.String,MPT.String.eCapitalization)
member.summary: Converts a single word to the specified capitalization format.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertTrueTrueBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a true/false string into a true/false boolean value. If input is not true/false, function will return false.
member.param: Parameter to convert. Capitalization does not matter.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ConvertTrueTrueString(System.Boolean,MPT.String.eCapitalization)
member.summary: Converts a true/false boolean into a true/false string.
member.param: Capitalization effect desired for returned string.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.myCInt(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to an integer if the string is numeric. Otherwise, returns 0.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.myCDbl(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a double if the string is numeric. Otherwise, returns 0.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.myCDec(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to an decimal if the string is numeric. Otherwise, returns 0.

member.name: M:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion.ParseTableName(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the table name with or without brackets, depending on what is specified.
member.param: If 'True', then any existing brackets will be removed. Otherwise, brackets will be added if they aren't already present.

member.name: T:MPT.String.cLibStringConversion
member.summary: Converts between a string value and another value, such as a boolean or enumeration.
